name: Bve Trainsim
description:
The Bve trainsim is a Windows game freeware that simulates train driving.
Features
Users can create their own routes and vehicles

You can create and drive your favorite routes and vehicles. Many route and vehicle data created by users are available on the web. By downloading and incorporating data, you can increase the number of routes and vehicles that can be operated.
We faithfully simulate the behavior of the vehicle.

We faithfully simulate motor controllers and brake systems with various control methods. You can also experience the difference in characteristics of each vehicle.

In addition to vehicle motion, we also use equations of motion to calculate the movement of the field of view and instrument movement. It realizes a movement with a sense of reality that is not just a production.
